title: Ford invests in car tech to boost automotive sales in China
text:
Ford invests in car tech to boost automotive sales in China 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
In order to combat slowing automotive sales in China, Ford has announced today that it's investing $1.8 billion (that's 11.4 billion yuan) t...
